All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BaseDAOException
The BaseDAOException class is the super class and the main triggering point for all DAO-layer sub-classes.
BaseServiceException
The BaseServiceException class is the super class and the main triggering point for all Service-layer sub-classes.
Database
 
IParticipantDAO
The IParticipantDAO interface provides the CRUD method definitions used by the DAO-layer classes.
IParticipantService
The IParticipantService interface contains the Service-layer definitions of the CRUD wrapper methods.
NoDataProvidedException
The NoDataProvidedException class is triggered when no data have been passed from the Registration form to the controller.
NoFirstnameException
The NoFirstnameException class is triggered when the Firstname form field is empty.
Participant
The Participant class is the abstract representation of an event participant.
ParticipantDAOImpl
The ParticipantDAOImpl class implements the CRUD methods as defined in the IParticipantDAO interface.
ParticipantDeleteDAOException
The ParticipantDeleteDAOException is triggered when there is an error in deleting a Participant record from the database.
ParticipantDTO
The ParticipantDTO class is the DTO equivalent of the Participant model class.
ParticipantGetDAOException
The ParticipantGetDAOException is triggered when there is an error in getting a Participant record from the database.
ParticipantInsertController
The ParticipantInsertController class acts as a controller between the user-client and the Service-layer.
ParticipantInsertDAOException
The ParticipantInsertDAOException is triggered when there is an error in inserting a new Participant record to the database.
ParticipantNotAddedException
The ParticipantNotAddedException class is triggered when there is an error in adding a new Participant record to the database.
ParticipantNotFoundException
The ParticipantNotFoundException class is triggered when a Participant record is not found in the database for either one of the following three operations: update, delete, get.
ParticipantServiceImpl
The ParticipantServiceImpl class implements the CRUD wrapper methods as defined in the IParticipantService interface.
ParticipantUpdateDAOException
The ParticipantUpdateDAOException is triggered when there is an error in updating a Participant record in the database.
